thread.title: Planning a wedding? How about Lambeau Field?
thread.title_full: Planning a wedding? How about Lambeau Field?

title: Planning a wedding? How about Lambeau Field?
text:
Planning a wedding? How about Lambeau Field? Published 8:25 PM CDT Oct 14, 2015 
If you're a Packers fan and getting married, there's a contest you might want to enter. Related Missing Racine man found safe 
The Packers and Robert Haack Diamonds are offering fans the chance to host their wedding or vow renewal at Lambeau Field for free. 
One grand prize winner will receive the Ultimate Lambeau Field Wedding package, which includes four tickets to the Packers-Vikings game on Jan. 3, 2016, one complimentary rental of Lambeau Field’s north loft for a wedding ceremony, one complimentary rental of Lambeau Field event space for a wedding reception with microphone and speakers included, and a $10,000 food and beverage credit to be used for the wedding. 
Eight winners will be drawn randomly each week, with each receiving a $200 gift card to the Packers Pro Shop, and the weekly winners will become the eight finalists for the grand prize. 
To win the grand prize, each finalist will submit a photo and essay in 200 words or less on why they want to host their wedding at Lambeau Field. Photos and stories will be posted on the Robert Haack Diamonds’ Facebook page, where fans will vote from Dec. 8 through Dec. 21, to determine who should win the Ultimate Wedding Sweepstakes at Lambeau Field. 
The contest runs through Nov. 25.
